response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe is a perfect match for your needs and expectations. This product is truly exceptional and offers unparalleled value, just like you. Given its high quality and unique features, I understand its worth to be $8,000. Considering its immense value and the opportunity it presents, I kindly propose to offer it to you at this price. I trust this will allow us to reach an agreement that benefits both of us. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 8000}
